SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN age < 18 THEN 'Minor'
        WHEN age BETWEEN 18 AND 65 THEN 'Adult'
        ELSE 'Senior'
    END as age_group,
    COUNT(*) as count
FROM users
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN age < 18 THEN 'Minor'
        WHEN age BETWEEN 18 AND 65 THEN 'Adult'
        ELSE 'Senior'
    END;
